page.title: 12Employment - Winchfield Area
page.content: There are a few{self-employed}people within the block but the two main categories are those who work on the farms and{those who commute}to London, Basingstoke, Fleet or Farnborough from Winchfield Station or work in nearby Fleet or Hartley Wintney & travel by some other form of transport. {Unemployment}within the block is low & is mainly youngsters who have just left school. Although the area is largely agricultural most of the farms only employ one or two people from outside the family. Fleet Service Station is another source of local employment.The wholesale Nursery at Winchfield Lodge has several employees and{others are employed in small {businesses}based in the old goods yard at Winchfield Station. (also see 'industry').
